bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walt Whitman to Ellen M. O'Connor, 23 March [1876]
bibl.orgName: The Henry W. and Albert A. Berg Collection of English and American Literature, New York Public Library

revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

body.p: Yours rec'dreceived—I am around, much the same—nothing very new, or different—the b[aby] doing well, grows well, hearty & bright—the rest well as usual—E[dward] recovered, & all right—my (new Edition) books out at last—(sent a set to N. M. J[ohnson] 506 12th st.)—comfortable to-day—write this in haste—
